research.title: Sistem Absensi Kampus Terintegrasi Berbasis AIoT dengan Pendekatan QoE dan Akuntabilitas Menggunakan RFID dan Computer Vision
research.description: Integrated campus attendance system based on AIoT with QoE and accountability approach using RFID and Computer Vision.

research.title: Integrasi Agentic AI dalam Pembelajaran Adaptif untuk Meningkatkan Kompetensi Bisnis Digital Mahasiswa
research.description: Integration of Agentic AI in adaptive learning to improve students' digital business competencies.

research.title: Peningkatan Kinerja Pengiriman Multimedia pada Internet of Things Berbasis Jaringan Sensor Nirkabel
research.description: Performance improvement of multimedia delivery on IoT based on Wireless Sensor Networks.

research.title: Pengembangan Sistem Pengiriman Data Berbasis Machine Learning untuk Peningkatan QoE pada Multimedia Internet of Things
research.funder: Riset dan Inovasi untuk Indonesia Maju
research.description: Development of ML-based data delivery system for QoE improvement in Multimedia IoT.

research.title: Sistem Pengelolaan WSN pada Multimedia IoT untuk Peningkatan Quality of Service
research.description: WSN management system for Multimedia IoT to improve Quality of Service.

research.title: Software-Defined Network pada Jaringan Sensor Nirkabel untuk Sistem Multimedia-Internet of Things (M-IoT)
research.description: SDN on Wireless Sensor Networks for Multimedia-IoT systems.

research.title: Pengembangan Platform Perawatan Tanaman Hidroponik dengan Analisis Citra Digital Berbasis Algoritma CNN dan IoT
research.description: Development of hydroponic plant care platform using CNN-based digital image analysis and IoT.
